SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Model.Card

Interface PlayableCard.CardState

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayableCard.CardDown, PlayableCard.CardUp
Enclosing class:
PlayableCard
private static interface PlayableCard.CardState
This interface is the state of a card, either up or down

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    canPlaceOver(CornerPosition position)
    This method returns true if and only if the specified corner is valid to place a card on top of it
    int
    countPoints(Station station)
    This method returns the points gained by the card effect after its placement in a station.
    boolean
    enoughResourceToBePlaced(Map<Symbol,Integer> freeResources)
    This method returns a boolean describing whether card has enough resources to be placed in station

    This method returns a specified card corner given a position
    HashMap<Symbol,Integer>
    getHashMapSymbols()
    This method computes symbols on the visible side of the card depending on its state
    List<Symbol>
    getPermanentResources()
    This method returns permanent resources on the visible side of the card depending on its state
    CardOrientation
    getState()
    This method returns CardOrientation.UP or CardOrientation.DOWN if the card is either in a state or the other
    void
    swap()
    This method switches the card state, if up to down, if down to up

  • Method Details

    • swap

      void swap()
      This method switches the card state, if up to down, if down to up

    • getCorner

      Corner getCorner(CornerPosition position)
      This method returns a specified card corner given a position
      Parameters:
      position - a position among CornerPosition
      Returns:
      Corner type of specified corner

    • enoughResourceToBePlaced

      boolean enoughResourceToBePlaced(Map<Symbol,Integer> freeResources)
      This method returns a boolean describing whether card has enough resources to be placed in station
      Parameters:
      freeResources - is the hashmap of free resources in card schema
      Returns:
      boolean

    • countPoints

      int countPoints(Station station)
      This method returns the points gained by the card effect after its placement in a station. If the card is on the back, this method returns 0.
      Parameters:
      station - the Station where the card is placed
      Returns:
      the points the card gives based on its effect when placed

    • canPlaceOver

      boolean canPlaceOver(CornerPosition position)
      This method returns true if and only if the specified corner is valid to place a card on top of it
      Parameters:
      position - a position among CornerPosition
      Returns:
      true if and only if the corner of chosen position is different from NotAvailableCorner

    • getState

      CardOrientation getState()
      This method returns CardOrientation.UP or CardOrientation.DOWN if the card is either in a state or the other
      Returns:
      CardOrientation.UP if cardState is dynamically UP, or CardOrientation.DOWN if cardState is dynamically DOWN

    • getPermanentResources

      List<Symbol> getPermanentResources()
      This method returns permanent resources on the visible side of the card depending on its state
      Returns:
      ArrayList<Symbol> of resources in the center of the card (it is always empty when the card is on front)

    • getHashMapSymbols

      HashMap<Symbol,Integer> getHashMapSymbols()
      This method computes symbols on the visible side of the card depending on its state
      Returns:
      HashMap<Symbol, Integer> of symbols and their quantities on the visible side of the card
